upgrade(Property) - Method in class property_tycoon.model.Player
Reduces the cash owned by this player by the amount it costs to upgrade the passed in property.

use() - Method in class property_tycoon.model.Card
Uses this card, executing its associated action and replacing it in its owner Group.
